message.body: Last night Ariel told me about grad school. I'm SO happy for you! Congratulations!! Thi is really amazing and you deserve it, you're so talented and passionate! See you in Boston for two yrs now!

Gina you are too kind!!!!!! Oh my god. I am so excited for school, boston, Ariel, you, trying to find affordable hot yoga, learning how to run along the Charles river, and getting all your pulling teeth. That is supposed to be cute, not sure it worked....
Very cute, but I'm looking forward to my teeth collection, you'll have to find another dentist to get teeth from.
